      • knapsackSum

        public static int knapsackSum(int[] w,
              int n,
              int limit)
        goes through the array recursively and finds the total without exceeding the limit
        Parameters:
        w - is the list of weights
        index - of current item
        limit - is the limit of weight
        Returns:
        maximum without exceeding limit

      • knapsackSum

        public static int knapsackSum(int[] w,
              int n,
              int limit,
              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        goes through the array recursively and finds the total without exceeding the limit and keeps track of the items as it goes
        Parameters:
        w - is the list of weights
        index - of current item
        limit - is the limit of weight
        list - is the list of items
        Returns:
        total without exceeding limit
